result.execSummary:
The defendant Mike Cartagena was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid at a rate of $25.00 per month commencing 12/15/15; alternate 12 days jail.
Restitution of $90.00 to be paid on payment plan along with fine and costs. (Payable to Stephanie D.) Restitution to be paid first.
DNA paid along with fine and restitution on payment plan.

Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
No contact with the victim.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mike Cartagena

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Return of Judgment of Conviction from 10/30/15.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.
Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: 10/28/15.

Defendant Mike Cartagena in court.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State provides an offer to the defendant. Court will give another date in 30 days for plea/sentencing. Defendant may pay restitution before the plea/sentencing date.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: Sep 25, 2015

Defendant Mike Cartagena in court.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation. State has not made an offer at this time. Defendant needs to notify ADA Woller of his probationary status.  Court will give another date in 2 - 3 weeks. Defendant to provide his new address in writing.  Hearing scheduled for September 25, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Notice of Hearing returned, for hearing scheduled on: 08/26/15.

Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant to have no contact with Stephanie D. victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint or her residence.

ADDRESS INFO for Mike Cartagena
Current: Salvation Army, Waukesha, WI 53188   (Effective: 08-03-2015)
Prior: 405 N Moreland Blvd,#8, Waukesha, WI 53188

Defendant Mike Cartagena in court, in custody, with attorney Samuel W. Benedict.   Kevin M. Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is not eligible for State Public Defender representation.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.
